```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(eia)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
eia_set_key("8a87a727635f5c834e2799cd76fcb820")

pull_load_data <- function(api_start, api_end) {
  EBA.CAL-ALL.D.H
}
x <- c("CAL", "CAR", "CENT", "FLA", "MIDA", "MIDW", "NE", "NY", "NW", "SE", "SW", "TEN", "TEX")
str_c("EBA.", x, "-ALL.D.H")

df <- eia_series("EBA.MIDA-ALL.D.H") %>% 
  select(data) %>% 
  unnest(data) %>% 
  mutate(date = as_datetime(date)) %>% 
  select(region, value, date)


```
